price: Kötü sözün misali de, yerden koparılmış,  sabit olmayan kötü bir ağaç gibidir.
arabic: وَمَثَلُ كَلِمَةٍ خَبِيثَةٖ كَشَجَرَةٍ خَبِيثَةٍ ٱجۡتُثَّتۡ مِن فَوۡقِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَا لَهَا مِن قَرَارٖ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamathalu kalimatin khabīthatin kashajaratin khabīthatin uj'tuthat min fawqi al-arḍi mā lahā min qarārin
